description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Save More Tomorrow.

hook.text: Nobody wants to save more today. But almost everyone agrees to save more starting next year.

discovery.text: Employees agree to increase their savings rate with each future raise. It feels painless.

twist.text: Over four raises, participants went from saving 3% to 14% of their income â€” without ever feeling poorer.

climax.text: The program works because it aligns with how our brains work: we discount the future and resist present pain.
